channel.title: How to write name onto a file?
channel.description:
I am creating 2 directories called "onBan" and "onMute", where the players will be temporarily placed until they are unban or unmuted. How do I code this so that it moves the players from the main directory (where all characters are originally located)? I also want to know is how to transfer names onto a list while server is still running, this way i don't have to restart server repeatedly.
I Need to figure out how to move a characters file to the onBan & onMute directory.

item.title: How to write name onto a file?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

So then a variable in the player’s file is a better choice, and when they are banned/muted, set that variable to the time of the ban/mute, and make it so three days (assumption) later, that variable equals 0, in which case it is also false.

Read full topic
item.source: How to write name onto a file?

item.title: How to write name onto a file?
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

_™:

Do what most people do, and use a text file and for people within that text file, isBanned/isMuted is true.

No, I am making it so that the ban/mute exceeds for a certain amount of time until player is unbanned/unmuted like in the Runescape game. This way I do not have to remember when to unban a player.

Read full topic
item.source: How to write name onto a file?

item.title: How to write name onto a file?

item.source: How to write name onto a file?

item.title: How to write name onto a file?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. Trying to “move” the character files to a whole new directory is too much work that you don’t want to have to deal with. It would have to involve loading all the characters from the main directory, and the onBan, AND the onMute. An easier way would be to just create a field in the character files that says either isBanned or isMuted
player-isBanned: false;
player-isMuted: true;

And for the list, it all depends on what you want to transfer. Do you want to transfer Banned users, muted users, or all players?

Read full topic
item.source: How to write name onto a file?
